Package nl.b3p.brmo.util.http.wrapper

Class Java11HttpClientWrapper

java.lang.Object
nl.b3p.brmo.util.http.wrapper.Java11HttpClientWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpClientWrapper<HttpRequest.Builder,HttpResponse<InputStream>>
public class Java11HttpClientWrapper extends Object implements HttpClientWrapper<HttpRequest.Builder,HttpResponse<InputStream>>
Wraps the Java 11 HttpClient. Follows redirects by default but sets the HTTP version to 1.1 instead of HTTP/2 if the httpclientwrapper.java11.http1_1 system property is set.
Author:
Matthijs Laan

      Parameters:
